name: Range
description: Has first strike on first turn only.

name: Block
description: Works like avoidance, but reduces damage by X, instead of outright.

name: Bulwark
description: Works like block, reduces damage by X+1, and stuns enemies, skipping their next turn.

name: Set Trap
description: Damage enemies for 5, when being attacked, once per combat, avoidable.

name: Inflict Poison
description: Inflicts poison status on the enemy, causing them 1 damage after attacking for the rest of combat.

name: Poisoned
description: Any poisoned unit takes 1 damage after attacking. Lasts rest of combat.

name: Enraged
description: Enraged units attack once again upon dying.

name: Misdirect
description: If the unit avoids damage, he rolls his avoidance again, if successful, the enemy hits a random target.

name: Pet Tank
description: 90% Avoidance until 6 damage has been avoided

name: Inflict Freeze
description: On hit, freezes enemy, skipping their turn, until they succeed an avoidance check, avoidable.

name: Frozen
description: Frozen units skip their turn until they succeed an avoidance check, unavoidable.

name: Inflict Burn
description: On hit, burns enemy, doing 3 damage each turn, ends on successful avoidance check, avoidable.

name: Burn
description: Burned units take 2 damage, when attacking, avoidable

name: Shockwave
description: After attacking, hit all enemies for 1, avoidable.

name: Crushing Blow
description: Attacks instantly kill enemies with less than 1/2 your HP, avoidable.
